title: Create a portfolio record
content:
1. From the main menu, select Plan > Application Portfolio > Portfolios. Service Management displays a list of portfolio records.

  2. Click New. Service Management displays a New Portfolio dialog box to gather basic information. Service Management doesn't assign an ID until you save the portfolio record.

  3. Complete the following fields:

    Field Description
    Title Enter a title of the portfolio.
    Description Enter a description that captures the details of the portfolio.

  4. Click Save when you are finished.

    This will open the portfolio and display the General tab.

  5. To add an application to the portfolio record:

    • Click the Contents tab of the portfolio.

    • Click Add or the grid icon to display the application list.

    • Select the application that you want to add from the application list or type a few characters to search for the application.

    The new application is then added to the portfolio. To add more applications, repeat step 5.
